attributes.action: allow citizens to have their distinct nationality included within the UK Passport, i.e. "English, Scottish, Welsh or N Irish citizen of the United Kingdom"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Post (the botched) devolution (assymetrical as the government calls it) it is clear the the UK is no more an actual country than Yugoslavia was, stitched together by propaganda and a controlled state media. Allowing citizens to define their actual nationality on UK passports would be good start to formalising our differences under the common umbrella, rather than the governments method of  forced Britishness (mainly aimed at the English) a la the style of the former USSR. A higher price for this enhanced passport would be part of ther package
